name: Adobe Acrobat Index File
summary: Learn about .PDX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: PDX indexes can be created under the Choose Advanced → Document Processing → Full Text Index with Catalog option in Adobe Acrobat. Other files may be added to an existing PDX index using the same option.
Adobe Acrobat is available in Standard, Pro, and Pro Extended versions.
